description.value: Starting at 6th level, you can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kmkxepwgsbta6ui]{Clairaudience/Clairvoyance} at will as a spell-like ability using your cleric level as the caster level. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
